trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of managed controls on a Word document that has been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 Word 文档中的托管控件集合，该文档已通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> methods and properties to manage controls on a Word document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>方法和属性以管理在 Word 文档上的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: To get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> object in a document-level project, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> property of the `ThisDocument` class in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>对象在文档级项目中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A>属性`ThisDocument`项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: To get an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> object in an application-level project, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document> host item that you create programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>对象在应用程序级项目中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document>，则在运行时以编程方式创建宿主项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> members to perform some common tasks related to controls on documents.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>成员来执行一些常见的任务相关的文档上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Task
trans-unit.target: 任务

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 操作

trans-unit.source: Add a control to the document.
trans-unit.target: 向文档添加控件。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the Add*ControlName* methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用添加之一*控件名称*方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, to add a content control, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddContentControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要添加内容控件，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddContentControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Remove a control from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Determine whether a control is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Pass the control or its name to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 将控件或其名称传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Get the index of a control in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中获取控件的索引。

trans-unit.source: Pass the control or its name to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 将控件或其名称传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Get a control from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中获取一个控件。

trans-unit.source: Pass the index or name of the control to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将索引或该控件的名称传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Item%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> that you want to replace with a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 希望更换为新 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件的现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" />。

trans-unit.target: 可用于索引 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例中控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the document at the location of the existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 向文档中指定的现有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 的位置添加一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control that was added to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.

trans-unit.target: 提供控件的边界的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: The name that can be used to index the control in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 可用于索引 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例中控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control to the document at the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的范围内向文档添加一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> control that was added to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to add <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> controls to the end of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>控件添加到末尾<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark> control that was added programmatically, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark>以编程方式添加的控件，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.

trans-unit.source: For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd> event of the `ThisDocument` class.
trans-unit.target: 对于 C# 中，你必须附加`ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd>事件`ThisDocument`类。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project.

trans-unit.source: Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd> event of the active document.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你必须将附加`ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd>活动文档的事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also adds the names of several colors to the list of items that users can select in the control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将多种颜色的名称添加到的用户可以选择控件中的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddComboBoxControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddComboBoxControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将添加一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>，基于在运行时在文档中的本机内容控件。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 这是有用的当你创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl>在运行时，并且你想要打开该文档在下次重新创建相同的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ComboBoxContentControl> for every native combo box that the user adds to the document.

trans-unit.source: This version is for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于文档级自定义。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd> event of the `ThisDocument` class.
trans-unit.target: 对于 C# 中，你必须附加`ThisDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd>事件`ThisDocument`类。

trans-unit.source: This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd> event of the active document.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你必须将附加`ActiveDocument_ComboBoxContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ContentControlAfterAdd>活动文档的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two custom user controls to the document using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将两个自定义用户控件添加到文档使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first control is added to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控件添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>。

trans-unit.source: The second control is added to a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 第二个控件添加到的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The code changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the first custom user control, which only moves the control relative to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite> that contains the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>的第一个自定义用户控件，只会将移动控件的属性相对于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite>包含文档上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite> returned by the second user control to illustrate the correct way to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 代码随后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite>返回的第二个的用户控件，用于说明设置的正确方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>的控件属性。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" />，或 <paramref name="range" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />，或 <paramref name="name" /> 参数长度为零。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds two custom user controls to the document using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将两个自定义用户控件添加到文档使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first control is added to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控件添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>。

trans-unit.source: The second control is added to a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 第二个控件添加到的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The code changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the first custom user control, which only moves the control relative to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite> that contains the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>的第一个自定义用户控件，只会将移动控件的属性相对于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite>包含文档上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code then sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite> returned by the second user control to illustrate the correct way to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 代码随后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite>返回的第二个的用户控件，用于说明设置的正确方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.GetInlineShapeForControl%2A> method returns `null`.

trans-unit.source: For controls that you add programmatically, the `name` parameter should contain the name that you specify as the last parameter of the Add\<*control*> method, not the `Name` property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式，添加的控件`name`参数应包含指定为添加的最后一个参数的名称\<*控件*> 方法，不`Name`的控件属性。

trans-unit.source: For controls that you add at design time, the `name` parameter should contain the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时添加的控件`name`参数应包含的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The control to be removed from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified control from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例中移除指定的控件。

trans-unit.target: 在设计时添加的控件不能从删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>实例。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method only to remove controls added at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法仅删除在运行时添加控件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control to be removed from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.

trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button> control and a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.MonthCalendar> control to the document, and then removes the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button> control.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the control to remove from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例移除的控件的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the control at the specified index in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例中指定索引处的控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified control is a member of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的控件是否为 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 实例的成员。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine whether a control is a member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定控件是否属于集合，然后再尝试对控件执行操作。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to confirm that a control has been added to, or is still a member of, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> instance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以确认的控件已添加到或仍是的成员<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>实例。
